channel.title: HOw can i make someone mod/admin?

item.title: HOw can i make someone mod/admin?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

omfg lolz , that is in client.java
but if you go to characters
and then choose the characters that you wanna make admin/mod/staff
just search for:
character-rights = 0
0 = normal
1 = mod
2 = staff
3 = admin
if you change it you doesn’y supose to compile it.
that is a better way.

item.title: HOw can i make someone mod/admin?
item.dc:creator: @meep meep
item.description:
@meep wrote:

Do this please:

Open client.java and search for: //start of moderator

Below that you will find this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Username")) { playerRights = 2; }

Change the “username” to the name that you login with.

Also, to add more moderators, go a bit lower until you see this:

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name")) { playerRights = 1; }

Once again, just change “name” to the person who you want to be a moderator.

REMEBER TO COMPILE BEFORE YOU RUN THE SERVER AGAIN.

That should do it. When you login, the server will recognise your name and change you to a moderator/owner/staff.

Or you can just change the character data again.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
item.source: HOw can i make someone mod/admin?

item.title: HOw can i make someone mod/admin?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“I Dont Spam”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“I Dont Hack”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ksmuffin”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“PureRunes1”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jimmy Jr.”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Killinator”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“I_0wn_Pl00x”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

Ok if you are using Cheez the default admin is x91 hit Ctrl+H and it brings up a window type in x91 and in the next text feild type in the admin name that you want. Above is my admins/mods so Yep… Anywho I hope that helped you out
